sections.purpose: To provide rotary motion for mixing culture tubes and flasks.
sections.scope: Applicable to mixing and incubation support in Microbiology.
procedure: Place culture containers evenly on the shaker platform.
Set the desired shaking speed and time on the control panel.
Start the shaker and confirm smooth rotation.
At the end of the cycle, stop the shaker before removing containers.
Clean the platform after use, especially if spills occurred.
precautions: Ensure containers are tightly closed to prevent leakage.
Do not exceed the maximum load capacity.
Do not operate the shaker on an unstable or sloping bench.
Inspect clamps and platform for wear or damage.
